NOTES:
This is a re-encode of Kamera&#039;s subbed cam....which is really good,nice to actually see a group go and cam it themselfs ;-)
The picture is of really high quality for a cam and the audio is loud,clear but has your normal hollow cam sound.....but overall
good.
On this encode i&#039;ve decided to leave the subs intact has there is 7 parts in the film where english text appears and if you cropped,you
would lose them aswell.
But what i have done is also done a cropped version and i have created my own subtitles for the english text part and have added them to
the cropped video......will be upping that version later.

WORK DONE:
Well firstly i stripped the audio and remastered in AA3.0......stills sounds like a cam,but sounds better to me.
Then i had to mux it back to the video and then filter the video....
Now there isn&#039;t any major difference has the video was already good,but had a touch too much rgb green and blue....so i reduced
both.
Also slightly added a touch more colour and done +21 on a sharpening filter......+ a few more tweaks.

Ps PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD MY RELEASES IF YOU DON&#039;T LIKE RE-ENCODES OR IF YOU THINK BY SOME
HOW ME RE-ENCODING THEM IS GOING TO MAKE THEM LOOK LIKE R5&#039;S....BECAUSE THEY DON&#039;T!!!!!

Anyway enjoy the movie,it&#039;s free!!!!
